item.description:
Directions: http://www.prudential...

Map (look at the upper left corner for the Terrace Food Court): http://www.prudential...

As you may know by now, we have a large meetup twice each month. This gives everyone an opportunity to come and make new friends, practice their Japanese or English, and enjoy dinner with a bunch of interesting people from around the Boston area (and overseas). Come on by, relax, practice in either language of your choice, and enjoy being part of our growing community!

By the way, we typically stay in the very back of the Prudential Food Court. Also, if you're interested in getting dinner, most of us go out to eat afterwards.

To help recover the costs of this website, if possible please bring a $2 donation.

We look forward to seeing you there!
item.name: Prudential Social Meetup
